name: WP Rate And Review
author: K.Kumar

sections.description:
WP Rate And Review show rating and review with multiple attracting designon product details page. You could control component of designs from plugin settings page. This plugin provide advance way of handle review and rating of woocommerce product.

Features

  • Show progress bar ratings in review tab on product details page.
  • Enable/disable rating progress bar.
  • Show number of ratings for each rating points. You could enable/disable from plugin settings page.
  • Show rate and review summary including to average rating of product.
  • Show total number of submitted reviews.
  • Show total number of submitted ratings.
  • Progress bar colors manageable from plugin settings.
  • You could use shortcode [wp_rate_review product_id=”product_ID”] to show review and rating summary on any page/post.
sections.installation:
1. Log-in to your WordPress admin panel.
  2. Go to plugins page and click on Add New button.
  3. Upload plugin’s zip file from your computer and activate plugin.
  4. Now you could see “WP Rate And Review” into dashboard menu.

1.0.1

  • Auto disable plugin if woocommerce not installed.
  • New Feature – Exclude Products to show summary.

1.0.0

  • Initial version
